name: Turn-Based Battle System Demo
description:
Hey everyone!

As you probably guessed by the captivating title of this project, this is just a prototype demo of a Turn-Based Battle System.

Things to try in this demo:
  • Defeat the Enemy AI
  • Right-Click on the Player UI box to display your active unit's stats.
  • Right-Click on the Move buttons to display their stats.

It's inspired by RPGs like Pokemon.  The mechs in the game are kind of irrelevant since they're just placeholders.  The same goes for the moves.

There is a death animation. So it's not totally static. 

Anyway, the purpose of this to test the functionality.  The demo is 3D but it could easily be used in 2D.  

I don't really have a roadmap, but here's what to expect in the future:
  • Item System
    • Players can open the Item Menu and use consumable items during battle.
    • The enemy will be able to do something similar
  • Unit Swapping
    • Player and AI can swap active unit with others in the party
  • Multiple Opponents
    • Possibility for 1 v 2,  and 2 v 2 Battles.
      • Maybe even Free-for-all Style.
    • The unit will be able to choose a target to attack.
    • Moves will be able to target all/multiple units.
  • Animations?!
    • I might add some just to make it more entertaining to work on.
  • Sound Effects?!
    • I'll probably add this for the same reason as the animations.

Thanks for checking out this demo!  

If you want to support my growth as a developer, I'm accepting donations. Any amount is appreciated.
